snippet: Editorial staff members of the news and aggregation site said they would join Writers Guild of America, East.
abstract: Huffington Post's editorial staff begins efforts to unionize; will join Writers Guild of America, East.
lead_paragraph: Editorial staff members of the news and aggregation site said they would join Writers Guild of America, East.

headline.print_headline: Huffington Employees Start Drive to Unionize
headline.main: Huffington Post Workers Plan to Unionize
